cab.content: Oolonel Jones29Circulated to the War Cabinet, Lord K. Cecil,The Italian ambassador read to me to-day a telegram from his Government to the effect that Monsieur Boselli would not be able to attend a Conference at Paris on the 15th September, and that it was suggested that it should not be postponed till the second week in October-,1-If, however, it were considered absolutely necessary that the Conference should be held on the 15th as fixed, the Italian Government would in that case have to be repre-sented by the Italian -ambassador in Paris,(Initialled) September 3rd.1917,H.
